org.cyclops.cyclopscore.item

Class BucketRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.item.BucketRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRegistry, IBucketRegistry

    public class BucketRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBucketRegistry
    This will take care of the logic of custom buckets, so they can be filled like other buckets.
